lead_paragraph: Economists are closely watching consumers’ behavior, as their spending has emerged as a main source of growth this year.

headline.main: Consumer Borrowing Rose Modestly in February

snippet: Economists are closely watching consumers’ behavior, as their spending has emerged as a main source of growth this year.
abstract: Federal Reserve says consumer borrowing rose at 5.8 percent annual rate in February, from 5 percent in January; total outstanding credit rose $17.2 billion to $3.57 trillion.
